attributes.action: lobby for compulsory CRB checks for all foreign national workers who work in the health and social care industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently some overseas workers who have a criminal record cannot be vetted prior to working in the UK, as many countries do not a central system to collate data and some do not share information re this. We need to protect our most vulnerable adults in hospitals,care homes and in their own homes from workers who can potentially exploit this lack of regulation.Unless there is a way of checking this then we should be putting pressure on employers not to employ these staff as they cannot guarentee if they have a clean criminal record or background.
